raw.chosen: Root cause found: PTY injection echoes the prompt text, completion scanner matches DONE/REVIEW keywords in the echo
raw.reasoning: The orchestrator sends a prompt containing 'Post REVIEW:PASS or REVIEW:FAIL'. The PTY echoes this text. onWorkerOutput scanner sees REVIEW:PASS in the echo and declares the agent done. Agents never actually work.
